overview: If you've ever wondered what lesbian seductions look like but just had the wrong equipment or inclinations to participate in one, your chance for enlightenment is at hand. Girlfriends Films brings you well over three hours of pure and untrammeled lesbian intimacy - from the moment when the dance bins to the very last shiver of pleasure.  Eight women, four younger and four older, in four sexy May-December couples, demonstrate the flowering of passion and the consummation of their desires in four scenes of beautiful Sapphic seduction, complete with moody lesbian piano music.  Lesbian Seductions - Older and Younger #15 brings you three hours of women passionately seducing each other and reaching intense orgasms!
tagline: The revealing twisted road from desire to pursuit and surrender.
title: Lesbian Seductions: Older/Younger 15
